SEARCH
Package ClientSide.stubs

Class SPlayGround

java.lang.Object
ClientSide.stubs.SPlayGround
public class SPlayGround extends Object
Stub to the playground. It instantiates a remote reference to the playground. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
